[tf]               You feel a warm, almost wet sensation in your $GROIN$ and go to investigate but stop suddenly.<br/>
"Urgh!" you cry out in your $VOICE$ as a sharp, twisting pain in your stomach doubles you over. You rub your hands over your gut, your $FACE$ wincing as the pain seems to clench your insides for a few seconds before subsiding. You stand up and compose yourself once the feeling has passed, but notice that your stomach seems to still be upset. It keeps grumbling and gurgling, and you suddenly feel like you've eaten too much. Was it something you ate, or nerves? Or something else?;
[status]               Your stomach keeps grumbling and gurgling, feeling full, and seems a little sensitive at the moment. You wonder whether this is all part of the game... or maybe just some bad food you ate.;
[short]               grumbling stomach;
[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               Another loss! You swear it was only because your sore, gurgling stomach was distracting you. You rub it uselessly with one of your hands, when suddenly that strange twisting sensation deep in your gut returns, but without the pain this time. You keep rubbing, and then suddenly just as the twisting stops your belly bloats up beneath your palm, pushing it outward as it seemingly inflates!<br/>
"Ah, $CUSTOM3$!" says the host, walking up to you, "Looks like you're showing! How exciting for you!"<br/>
"Sh... showing? What are you talking about?!"<br/>
"Why, your little bundle of joy of course!" The host comes over and pats you on your distended belly. "Congratulations! I'm sure you'll make a great mummy!"<br/>
"M-mummy?!" You spit back, aghast "Are you saying I'm... pregnant?! I'm a dude!"<br/>
"Perhaps... but for how much longer? Ha ha ha! Good luck!" As the host walks away, you look down at your belly poking conspicuously through your $SHIRT$. You have to win this thing!;

Relieved, you sit with your chubby thighs spread far apart to accommodate your belly. You didn't realise how much your feet were aching! [tf]               "A bit uncomfortable there, $CUSTOM3$?" the hosts asks as you struggle to re-arrange your $BREASTS$ inside your tiny pink t-shirt. "We know how hard it is to find decent clothes for a pregnant body. Step into the dressing booth over there and get changed - you'll feel a lot better!"<br/>
Reluctantly, you waddle over to a small booth with a curtain that has suddenly appeared behind you. Stepping in and drawing the curtain closed, you find that one wall of the booth has a mirror on it, and on the ground is a single item of clothing - a maternity bra!<br/>
"Do you seriously expect me to wear that?!" you cry out in your $VOICE$. Still, your shirt is so uncomfortable, and soggy with your milk. You already look ridiculous - may as well try to get comfortable! With a bit of effort, you awkwardly pull off your shirt, your fat tits flopping free as it comes off. You catch the sweet whiff of your milk as the shirt comes over your $FACE$. You take a moment to bask  in your relief, your heavy jugs resting on your $CUSTOM1$. Eventually you work up some courage and put on the maternity bra, slipping your round dark breasts into the soft white padded cups. With a bit of fumbling you hook it up at the back.
